arabic_text: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَآ أَشۡرَكُواْۗ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗاۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِوَكِيلٖ
translation: If Allah had willed, they would not have associated partners with Him. We have not made you a keeper over them, nor are you their trustee[35].
footnotes: [35] Your duty is only to deliver the message.
